attributes.action: Either stop or all incoming flights or require Covid-19 testing for at airports
attributes.additional_details: There is no use of ensuring the UK public is in self isolation to avoid spreading of the virus when we are potentially letting hundres of infected visitors everyday. Makes no sense. Please stop the incoming flights or have some testing.
attributes.background: There is no point of having a lock down where we still getting visitors from Italy, USA and other high risk countries. Please temporarily stop all incoming flights or mandate Covid-19 testing at the airports.

rejection.details:
